marker.name: Ohrange
marker.description: Two people playing german and bavarian music. It will be fun!

marker.name: Three past eight - comedy night
marker.description: Music cabaret artists present you the whole musical history.

marker.name: LaserTag Regensburg
marker.description: Have fun playing LaserTag on 450 m². LASER TAG is probably the most exciting live game that simulates an actual battlefield. n a more technical definition, LASER TAG is a team or individual activity that involves the use of hand-held infrared-emitting targeting device. So this means no pain as targeting or shooting is done via light or simply put, laser. Make sure to call us before your visit so that you can book it.

marker.name: Naturkunde-museum Ostbayern
marker.opening: Mondays • 9.00 AM to 12.00 AM | Tuesday to Friday • 9.00 AM to 4.00 PM | Sundays 10.00 AM to 5.00 PM
marker.description: You can learn more about nature and environment at the city's museum for nature. There are exhibitions about biotopes and landscapes.

marker.name: Talk about national security
marker.description: How resistent is our infrastructure against terrorist attacks, cyber attacks and other risks? Taking part is for free. Register: www.cubos-internet.de/symposium

marker.name: Carolus Thermen
marker.description: The Carolus Thermen Bad Aachen with their four worlds of relaxation offer unique possibilities of letting yourself go for a few hours.

marker.description: Performance of a summernight @ Das Da Theather Aachen by David Greig and Gordon McIntyre. Regular: 24.50€, reduced: 16€.

marker.name: Biology Springparty
marker.description: Springparty of the faculty of Biology at the NOX Club. Celebrating the end of exams. Entrance: 5€ and free shots

marker.name: Indoor Climbing Wall
marker.opening: Monday to Wednesday • 10.00 AM - 11.00 PM | Thursday • 9.00 AM - 11.00 PM | Friday • 10.00am - 11.00pm | Saturday to Sunday &bull: 10.00 AM - 10.00 PM
marker.description: The DAV Kletterzentrum Regensburg offers around ca. 2300 sq m climbing space in total (1.400 sq m indoor & 900 sq m outdoors), climbing-routes from 3rd to 10th skilllevel and wall-height of 14,50m
